document.full_text: a six-square-mile fire that destroyed four houses likely was caused by sparks thrown off by a brush hog tractor mower that struck metal, oklahoma city's deputy fire chief said on thursday.
document.title: sparks from mower likely caused 1,500-acre oklahoma fire
lines_and_colors: a six-square-mile fire that destroyed four houses likely was caused by sparks thrown off by a brush hog tractor mower that struck metal, oklahoma city's deputy fire chief said on thursday.
